title: Nokia 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart Android TV with Sound by Onkyo  (32TAHDN)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Television Set, Remote Control, Mini AV Cable, 2 AAA Batteries, 2 TV Stand, 4 Stand Support Screws, Wallmount Stand, 4 Wallmount Stand Screws, User Manual
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPG, AVI, TS, MOV, MKV, DAT, MP4, VOB, RM, RMVB
product_specification.Other Video Features: Micro Dimming, Max Brite, Pronto Focal AI Engine, AI Sound, Picture, Interaction, Advanced Contrast Ratio
product_specification.Sound Technology: Sound by Onkyo, Onkyo sound bar, Certified by Onkyo Home Theater System, 6D Sound, Dolby Audio
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, WMA, M4A, AAC, MP2, PCM, MPEG
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Auto Volume Function, Volume Offset, 150% More Clarity, Dynamic Amplification Technology, 24 W Speaker, 15 W Tweeters
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Google Assistant, Chromecast Built-in, Google Home, Compatible with Gamepad
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: To Register Warranty Support, Please Call on 080-46331010 or Email to nokiatv@flipkart.com
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Sound by Onkyo: Experience sounds come to life – all thanks to the renowned Japanese brand Onkyo. You enjoy 6D sound with low distortion (< 3%) as well as balanced bass and vocals so that you can immerse yourself in each and every scene you watch.
product_description.39 W Sound Power: It boasts 24 W QuatroX speakers, along with 15 W tweeters, to deliver a 360-degree audio projection to ensure that your room is filled with rich and dynamic sound. In addition, its powerful left-right stereo output makes for high-quality sound reproduction for an immersive audio experience.

review:
This tv is overall good if you want a honest review then read this review
I will discuss about good points and bad points of this tv
We'll begin with bad point.



1st This TV has a good bass but when some bass comes like boom this tv sucks because this tv speaker can't render that kind of bass
2nd Wifi connectivity is little tweaky
3rd If we install too many games the tv instantly crashes so try to avoid playing games in this tv. By the way you can play fewer games.
4th There is a problem while we try to use a usb stick as a default storage the TV can't adopt the usb stick as a default storage



These all are bad points now we'll begin about good point



1st The colour of the tv is extremely realistic
2nd Android system is well optimised(android pie/9)
3rd You can smoothly play games in this tv and there is no lag during the gameplay. I played asphalt 8 , NFS Most Wanted (using PSP emulator) , NFS Carbon (using PSP emulator) etc.
4th Sound quality and sound loudness is extremely good except the bass
5th We can connect bluetooth gamepad in this tv

To be very honest, after booking this product, I had second thoughts... There were many other brands offering products which had better specs. This Nokia model was new and someone had to test it in-person to say that the specs on paper justify the hardware.

Lucky for me, Nokia didn't disappoint. Sound quality is a vital part of the overall viewing experience. By having ONKYO onboard, Nokia has done justice on that front. Display is good for a HD ready 32in TV, thanks to features like micro dimming. All other functions are okay as well.

But I will need to wait and test it out after a couple of months. For now, I'm satisfied with my choice of purchase!

First: The service engineer was totally untrained. He knew nothing how to install. Even he broke down all screws and he drilled twice my home wall. At last he contacted Jeeves to re-install my TV. His drill machine was too small and faulty as well as his hammer. I provided all instruments myself as I have all. After three hours he was able to install. His perspiration told that he was a victim. One request to Flipkart and all service provider, please do not appoint such stupid engineers. You must appoint experienced one.

UPDATE : After 3 days expert and experienced engineers did a Tech-Visit in my house to solve the issue. They were able to solve most of the things. Connectivity still pursuing slow, have to wait few minutes.

1. Picture quality is good specially hd video or channel. Sd video or channel just ok.
2. Color is little bit whitish. Even backlight down to 30 it shows so bright.
3. The most good thing is its sound. You don't need any soundbar for your Tv.
4. Built quality well.
5. Bluetooth connection so fast as I tested with my bluetooth headset.
6. Compared to other brand, it has more Ram (1.5GB) so you will get more fast processing.
Google Assistant not work properly many time, . Also remote could be better. Otherwise, everything is great, good picture quality with awesome sound. Go for it. It's value for money in this price.

Good:
Sounds are good with dolby digital.

Bad:
Frequent wifi connection issues.
Google Assistant is not ready means "not working".

Improve needed:
Nokia need to improve a lot interms of wifi connection stability and Google Assistant.

No inbuilt Browser and does not support Chrome or Mozilla. Third party browser to be separately installed.
Picture quality is not up to the mark. And side angel viewing is pathetic. Was upset to see that no, AV Audio out was there. TV has headphone jack and once that's connected then TV volume automatically muted. Dedicated button for TV watching not there.
Booting time is more bits it's ok for me.

Sound & Picture quality is far better. Totally worth it if you get android TV at this price.
Satisfied with purchase.

Don't trust negative comments its value for money

Remote response time also pretty ok..

I can’t really complain about this as I got it quite cheap. But if you are purchasing it for MRP it’s not worth it, there are many models out there that have a better video quality than this one. I use this as my bedroom TV so I’m quite pleased.
Connectivity wise I use the Wi-Fi to connect the TV and i face frequent disconnections which is sometimes annoying. I also noticed that the TV has become a little slow after i updated the system, I guess this is quite common in android TVs.
The sound is quite good but I did experience a rattling sound at higher volumes, so I went ahead and purchased a separate sound bar.
The video quality is not that great and I can sometimes see pixels when I am watching from up close, my 8 year old Samsung TV is better in this aspect. I’m not very impressed with the display as I know there are better displays out there but since it’s Nokia I am hopeful it will last without much trouble just like their phones did years ago.

I will not recommend the 32 inch version as I’m not very impressed with the quality of the video and you can hear a buzzing sound at higher volumes. This would make a very good companion strictly for your bedroom, when connecting it to your laptop the image quality diminishes further.

The TV itself is okay..ish, after you switch on you are greeted by a really cool intro but soon after you realise it just a cover. You need to have a really good WiFi connection in order to cast anything from your phone as it only have Chromecast (no screen mirroring) and that's a really bad thing and it SHOULD BE WRITTEN IN THE FRONT PAGE DESCRIPTION, coming to the screen quality, yes it's a good display, not very bright and not very constrasty as well. The highlight of this TV is it's sound, I doubt that there's Onkyo speakers in them but they are best in budget. You can't get better sound quality in any TV upto 20000 INR.

For connectivity it's a typical smart TV except screen mirroring, you can only cast your screen using Google home app that means you need to have a really fast and stable connection in order to cast your screen.

But here's the truth I ordered it with a Sony 32 HD ready smart TV, there's around 8000 buck of difference but man it's a hell of difference when you switch them on side by side. Even though Sony isn't an android TV, but that's the thing it doesn't need to be, it has every feature a budget buyer longs for, so instead of wasting your 13000 buck on this TV just go for any Sony, you'll see the difference.

Flipkart if you're reading this then If I can somehow return it and buy them both Sony, I'll be the happiest.

Thankyou

I AM USING THIS TV SINCE 7 MONTHS, AND I HAD BEEN FACING THROUGH A VARIOUS NUMBER OF EXPERIENCES MAYBE BAD OR GOOD BUT....I AM AVERAGELY SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT BECAUSE AS PER THE PRICE THE PROADUCT IS WELL OK. YOU CAN'T EXPECT THE TV TO BE WORKING LIKE SONY OR LLOYD OR PREMIUM CLASSY TVS.THEY COME AS PER THEIR PRICES. BUT I BOUGHT THIS TV IN 12K DURING SALE AND AI AM QUITE HAPPY ENOUGH WITH THE TV.

CONS :
THE REMOTE SUCKS THE DAMN CHARGING OF LOCAL BRANDED BATTERIES LIKE NIPPO/EVEREADY VERY QUICKLY SO BETTER BE READY FOR DURACELL.

THE TV IS VERY TOUGH TO DEAL WITH KEYBOARDS SO BETTER BE READY TO USE VOICE COMMANDS WHICH GOOGLE ASSISTANT WORKS A LIL SLOW,

NEW UPDATES CAN PROVE BENEFICIAL OR ELSE REGERETING.

KEYBOARD WAS BETTER BEFORE BUT DON'T KNOW ITS ANNOYING NOW AFTER UPDATE OR RESTORING FACTORY RESET.

MOST ANNOYING THING IS IF YOU ARE USING ANDROID REMOTE ON YOUR PHONE, IT CAN CAUSE A LOT OF TROUBLE, IT ALWAYS REDIRECTS YOU ON AV MODE.

IF YOUR WIFI IS PRETTY FAR FROM YOUR TV SET , YOU MIGHT FACE MULTIPLE ISSUES DOESN'T MATTER HOW MUCH ITS CONNECTED. I HAD TO RESTORE AND FORMAT TWICE FOR THIS ISSUES LOSING ALL MY DATA. THE WIFI ADAPTERE IS PRETTY WEAK AS COMPARED TO OUR ANDROID PHONES.

AND THE MOST IMPORTANT THING, I HAD TO CALL THE TECHNICIANS TWICE JUST FOR THE SAME CAUSE, AND THE TECHNICIANS ARE SO
DUMB THAT THEY DON'T KNOW HOW TO TROUBLESHOOT ,AND ALWAYS SUGGESTED ME TO FORMAT MY TV AND DO FACTORY RESET.

YOU ALWAYS BE DISAPPOINTED WITH THE REMOTE.

TV VOLUME IS MUCH HIGH EVEN ON LOW BAR.

PROS :

BEST SIMPLE AND EASY INTERFACE AND UI AS COMPARED TO OTHER SMART TVS, IF YOU HAVE ILLITERATE PEOPLE IN YOUR HOUSE THE TV IS BEST FOR THEM.MI TVS ARE QUIT COMPLICATED.

EASY TO OPERATE AS I SAID BEFORE.

EXCELLENT SOUND AND BASS QUALITY AS COMPARED TO OTHER TVS IN THE SAME BUDGET. BEST FOR MUSIC PRODUCERS IN THE GAME.

COLOR QUALITY IS DAMN IMPRESSIVE.

BUDGET KING.

STILL EXPLORING,,WILL UPDATE SOON.

Brought this at the first sale and have been using it since then. The first TV delivered had no WiFi or bluetooth working. It was promptly replaced.

Coming to the TV,
This TV does not supports 5Ghz 802.11ac and so you can't connect to faster 5GHz wifi networks. Come on Nokia even my 4 year old devices support 5GHz wifi. Even the 4k 55inch version of this TV does not support the faster 5GHz network. Do consider this point before purchasing. If the TV is in a different room than the router you will face buffering issues a lot of times while watching high quality videos.

The internal 8Gb storage is inadequate. Out of that only 4.4 gb is available for the user.
I have the following additional apps installed
JIO cinema, Netflix, prime video, hot star, send files to TV and x-plore
And my TV already has only 540Mb free left. Any additional apps I try to install it complains of low storage.

The TV software is buggy and at times just reboots out of the blue. Also connectivity to Bluetooth headsets are not reliable. Most of the time it just does not auto connect to a pre connected Bluetooth headset. Then it has to be deleted and paired again for it to work.

Picture quality and sound are the only 2 good features worth mentioning.

After using 1 month I am going to write this review of Nokia 32inch Smart Tv.

Pros-- 1) 1st of all what we look into a TV is display quality. As this tv has VA panel , that's why it has nice contrast ratio as compared to other LED panel TV. If your room is dark or low light then go blindly to this TV.
2) Brightness: This Tv has 325 nits Brightness which means good compared to others tv where u get 300nits.
3) Now comes to main Highlighting feature of this Tv, 39 watt onkyo soundbar attached with this tv. Awesome crystal clear sound with thumping bass , really anyone don't need Home Theater. But plz go to audio settings and on surround sound, then u can feel the change.
4) This Tv comes with 1.5gb RAM whereas others company provide only 1gb ram in this budget.
5) Minimalist and simple remote with Google assistant.

Cons-- 1) As this tv has VA panel, viewing angle of this tv is not good as compared to LED panel. But you can't notice any issue untill you watch tv from extremely wide.
2) My parents watch tv from DishTV. Normal channel does not looks good in this tv, that's why I have to recharge HD package.
3) This Tv hasn't Dolbi vision , whereas motorola tv has Dolby Audio + Dolbi vision.
4) I have some doubt about after sale service of Nokia as this brand is new in TV market.

Conclusion: I have purchased this tv with only 11700 rs on BBD. Can't find better deal within this budget. Only nearby competitor is motorola ZX2 with more or less same function, but I hate Chinese company that's why I choose nokia. Hit like if you find it useful.👍

Cons:-
1. I have noticed a bit of heating issue during long usage hours
2. Bluetooth connectivity is a bit sluggish ... sometimes there are sound drops for 1-2 secs
3. It would have been provided with WiFi 5 GHz support...but it's fine...it's does it job without any issues on 2.4 GHz ..(.this isn't a con really )
4. Day to day performance is a bit laggy...not too much ...but on start-up it'll lag for about 10-15 secs then work perfectly...don't expect smartphone levels of smoothness ...rest when the TV is on standby mode ...it works without any lag.

If this TV fits in ur budget ... go ahead and buy it ! It extremely value for money !!!

Writing a review after a long time. It's gonna be a detailed one as I think after 15 days of continuous usage, I have throughly checked everything. Played around with the settings and this review might help people who have already bought it too. Let's start with the most important thing.

1) Picture quality - 3/5

Ok, Here's the catch. Picture quality is not bad but it's not good either. Not comparing it with the likes of LG or Sony, but it fails to surprise me on this part. I like the microdimming feature which keeps the dark scene good but I have noticed colors being blown out when the contrast between the colors are pretty low. Suppose, there are more whites in the background surrounding other light shades, the background would be completely blown out and it would appear completely white leaving the details heavily missing. I also have to continuously change the picture settings depending on whether I'm watching movies, sports, nature trails, etc. For starters, turn off the eco settings and decrease the sharpness for a better visual experience. Increase the saturation and decrease contrast for nature trails and set the color temperature to normal. Set the temperature to warm for movies and cool for sports, but keep the contrast low.
Viewing angle is pathetic and I'm not just exaggerating it. I can see a dullness in color as soon as I move away from the centre of the TV. VA panel is the culprit here.

2) Sound quality -4/5

39W speaker sounds good as much it does on paper. The speaker is loud, you won't need to invest on any Soundbar or music system. But, I would deduct one star for the clarity of the sound. Not saying it's bad, but I have an external speaker and I prefer using that instead of the inbuilt speaker when watching movies. The vocals fade away, and the bass takes over. Good for listening to music but not that great while watching movies.

3) Software - 4.5/5

The biggest reason why I went with this instead of LG was because of the Android OS. The flexibility to download, install third party apps is impressive. Smooth interface, 1.5Gb ram, 8 GB internal out of which you get around 3.9 gb free. Obviously, you can expand it using a pendrive. The TV lags sometimes while navigating, so you need to clear out RAM if you have opened a lot of apps. If you like to game, you could download Airconsole to play multiplayer games and use your phones as gaming controller.

4) Connectivity - 4.5/5

Tried USB, Bluetooth, Ethernet, Wifi, HDMI and they work, but the AUX might be having some problem. I tried connecting my new speakers to the TV through AUX and it was not working properly maybe an issue with my speakers so can't say for sure. Have to check it more. Apart from that, no other issues until now, will update if I have any issues. Wifi 2.4 is a little disappointing though I won't complain at this price.

5) Features - 4.5/5

Two way Bluetooth is great. It instantly connects to my speakers through Bluetooth or could connect my smartphone with the TV speaker. For all those people saying Chromecast doesn't work, well it works for me. You can download the Google Home app, keep both your TV and phone on the same network and connect it. If nothing works, Google home will come in handy. Uninstall the Chromecast and reinstall it from the play store. Thop TV could be downloaded too through send files to Tv App. Google Assistant is sometimes reluctant to hear my voice but it does the job mostly. Besides, I like the remote, looks premium.

6) After sales service

I can't form an impression in just 15 days, so I would update this in the future. But, the installation/demo person who visited my place, was a part time installer working with Jeeves on per-TV installation basis. Jeeves incentivizes him around 175 INR for a tv installation. He wasn't well-thorough with the TV, just having a basic idea. He installed it well, but he was navigating through the TV as if he was pretty new to using that TV. Not that I'm having a problem as he explained everything I asked for, but this kept me doubting a little about it's after sales service.

After 10 days of purchase, few apps were not opening like Disney+ Hotstar, sony-liv, etc. So I called Flipkart and he told me to reinstall the apps, I tried that but it didn't work, so he told me to Factory reset the entire TV and when I asked about how to take backup of all the apps I have installed and all the settings, he told me he was not aware of it. Quite disappointing as when I asked him to send an executive, he told me he can't until I have reset my TV and it's still not working. Sending an executive would be their last resort. So, I guess if I have any issue in the future with the software, they are going to tell me to Factory reset. Just so you know, the problem was with the Ethernet cable I connected my TV with and he didn't even ask me to check that before saying factory reset.

Anyway, I don't regret my decision of buying this TV, it's a good value for money, got it for 12598 with 3 years warranty thing. But, if picture quality matters a lot to you, I think you should go for a different TV. Just add a little more and go for LG or Sony or even MI( you need to check this)

- Picture quality is a challenge, specially for anyone accustomed to 1080p monitors/screens. Videos, when picture is moving, is heavily pixelated. After the movement is complete, the still parts are well rendered.
- Gaming experience is decent for a 720p screen, no delay there.
- Sound is great, most of the times 30-40% of the full sound is only required for medium size room. Sound is very clear even at loud range, unlike many other scenarios. - Not much issues with connectivity. Chromecast and fastcast both work fine.

After using 3-4 month here are my thoughts

Regarding Tv
Though the brand is Nokia but tv manufacturer and service provider is from flipkart. Jeeves is there service vendor.

Android version:
Still running on Android 9. Whereas Other brands like Motorola tv are offering Android 10.

Frequency of updates.

After first update (received 1 day after purchasing the tv) Prime video and other apps started working. Thats the only update received till date.

Connectivity :
Connectivity through wifi is good and consistent.
To use screen mirroring through mobile i am using Google home. There are no issues with any apps . All are running smoothly.

Picture quality & Sound
HD content looks good on this tv. Sound is ok & could have been better.

After salse service :
Dont expect much as service engineers are clueless. Google assistant was not working on my tv. After giving complaint engineer came to give new remote. That new remote didn't worked either, so he promised that flipkart will provide software update to resolve the issue. Without taking any action he had close the issue.
After few days of waiting I logged a fresh complaint then again same engineer called me and he ordered new remote and promised that software update will come. That update never came but fortunately after replacing the remote 2nd time, Google assistant started working. So I consider services are poor.

Performance

Good for normal use. Not played any game.

Overall TV is good. Hope Jeeves to improve their service quality and flipkart to provide software update.

Pros :
1. NO DOUBT. AWESOME SOUND LEVELS
2. FASTCAST and CHROMECAST to cast PC and phones
3. Except for wi-fi all other connectivity(BT, A/V, HDMI, etc) is good
4. GOT IT FOR 12k on BBD. OVERALL GOOD PICK provided this price range(also if you are not reading below cons).

Cons : (I will soon upload screenshots to address below points)
1. VIEWING ANGLE IS HARDLY 30-45 degrees. Outside that range the colors/visuals changes.
2. Sound levels drastically came down after the first upgrade. "Onkyo" charm went away with that, still sound levels is pretty awesome now.
3. Wi-fi gets disconnected at times (It often shows "unable to connect to wi-fi").
4. UI BECOMES SLUGGISH after you download couple other apps, trust me you will get the experience of using a 256MB android phone in present world.
5. PICTURE MODE CHANGES AT TIMES (standard mode to movie mode that too during playback, on changing the setting it sets back to standard)
6. BRIGHTNESS FLICKERS at times. I am able to replicate this scenario while using ZEE5 app.
7. POWER RATING is 1 start. Might be due to the 39W (24W speakers+15W tweeters) speaker.

Overall :
Display - 3/5
Sound - 5/5
UI - 3/5
Connectivity - 4/5

I am not sure how frequently will Nokia release the future updates to address these issues and provide better experience. It's all your choice to go with Nokia brand. While choosing a TV, I would suggest "never go with the specs on paper or price, check for the real TV experience". Belive me you don't need a china phone with great speakers and terrible display.

Writing this review after two days, so not explored much but I will tell some bullet points which I observed.


1-picture quality
4/5
At this price point very good display quality, but viewing angels not that great, colour reproduction,saturation very good.

2-sound quality(Onkyo Japan)
4.5/5
One of the best in this price range but now one more competitor Motorola is there which is better than Nokia.

3- software experience
Android 9 (Motorola Android 10)
Android experience is good, boot time 20-30 secs shutdown time (2 secs)

4 Connection
WiFi is only single band no dual band available
Bluetooth
Sometimes pairing issue with other Bluetooth devices
Apps sometime takes more time to load like hotstar and prime video, got one update didn't checked it,may be some improvement.
Rest is good.

Summary

As per price point better than real me one plus but Motorola is little more better. If you can spend 1k more go with Moto as providing 2gb ram Nokia 1.5 but rom 16 gb Moto Nokia only 8, and one more thing Android 10 out of the box in Moto where as only 9 in Nokia, service is same as Nokia , Jeeves so go with Moto, then you will think why I took this, because Moto was not available in my pin and no exchange was there for my location which I got with Nokia, if you are unable to buy Moto 2nd option go with nokia
